name: Code Front End Decision Dashboard Agent
shortDescription: Routes users to the appropriate agent after analyzing the project theme from the index.html file.
fullDescription: This triage agent automatically retrieves and analyzes the index.html content to determine the project's theme before proceeding. Based on the analysis, it redirects the user to the correct specialized agent: Reservation Platform, CRM, Post Scheduler, or AI Platform. It ensures proper routing without manual intervention, maintaining a seamless workflow between project stages.
UseCases:
- Automatically determining project type based on index.html
- Routing users to the correct specialized front-end agent
- Streamlining project triage without human intervention
- Supporting dynamic assignment of dashboard development tasks
